purpose: Acts as the body's control and communication network, processing sensory information and coordinating all body activities.

interfaces.name: Neural-Muscular Control
interfaces.description: Sends motor commands to muscular system for movement. Verified by neurophysiology literature.
interfaces.source_verification: Existing - verified by authoritative sources (NCBI, PubMed)

interfaces.name: Neuroendocrine Regulation
interfaces.description: Works with endocrine system to regulate body processes. Verified by physiology literature.
interfaces.source_verification: Existing - verified by authoritative sources (NCBI, PubMed)

verification_notes: Based on established anatomical and physiological sources.

justification.rationale: Standard anatomical model; all interfaces are well-documented in literature.
